EmailTemplate.name: ENS International: eLearning Access
EmailTemplate.subject: ENS International: eLearning Acess
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Job__c.NAM_Name__c}
Please note that access to our online reinforcement module is now available to you and your participants.
Feel free to login and see the module yourself using your email address as the username and password.
Access to the reinforcement module is via: http://www.negotiate.org/ens-reinforcement-login
Kind regards
